```{r}
petrifiedwood <- read.csv("C:/Users/Colin/Desktop/petrifiedwood.csv")

lambda_1<-sum(petrifiedwood$X1intLength[1:16])/(12*1000)

lambda_2<-sum(petrifiedwood$X2intLength[1:39])/(12*1000)

both_samples<-c(lambda_1,lambda_2)
est_percent_cover<-mean(both_samples)
SE<-sd(both_samples)

#90 CI for number of  tpHA#
est_percent_cover + c(-1,1)* SE * qt(p=.95,df=1)

```
